examples: In a criminal trial the standard of proof is beyond the reasonable doubt.
During a debate, each debater has the burden of proof to support their arguments and convince the audience of their position.
In a criminal trial, the prosecution bears the burden of proof to demonstrate the guilt of the accused beyond a reasonable doubt.
When making an argument or presenting a case, it is important to provide strong evidence to support your claims and carry the burden of proof.
The job candidate's resume looked impressive, but the proof of the pudding is in the eating, and we need to see how well they perform in a real work setting.
words.defineEn: information or evidence that proves the truth or existence of something
words.defineVi: thông tin hoặc bằng chứng chứng minh sự thật hoặc sự tồn tại của một cái gì đó

examples: The intern had to make up for the absent administrative assistant and answer the phones all day.

However, the absence of an effective social security system meant that the government's response to these problems was for all intents and purposes non-existent.

examples: The farmer employs modern agricultural techniques to maximize the yield of his soybean crop.

words.defineEn: the distance from the top to the bottom of something or someone
words.defineVi: khoảng cách từ trên xuống dưới của một cái gì đó hoặc một ai đó

examples: The colorful bird flew high in the sky.
The prices at the luxury boutique were quite high.
Unfortunately, the price of short ribs can be quite high.
He had high expectations for the team's performance in the tournament.
They set high standards of customer service.
words.defineEn: having a relatively great vertical extent
words.defineVi: có một phạm vi dọc tương đối lớn

examples: The width of the bookshelf is 120 centimeters.
So this has width b as well.
What is the width of Mike's dog pen?
You add the two widths.
but you lose some width.
words.defineEn: the distance of something from side to side
words.defineVi: khoảng cách của một cái gì đó từ bên này sang bên kia

examples: On the credit side, the restaurant offers a wide range of choices.
The talented actor effortlessly portrayed a wide range of characters, from a hero to a villain.
The fast runner won the race by a wide margin.
Italy's Mediterranean climate and diverse geography offer a wide range of outdoor activities
The furniture store has a wide section of sofas, tables, and chairs.
words.defineEn: having a large length from side to side
words.defineVi: có chiều dài lớn từ bên này sang bên kia

examples: Employment rises by two and a half million.
Employment lawyers report an uptick in layoffs of older workers as a result of the pandemic-induced recession.
On Sunday, a majority of the Trump campaign staff ended their employment.
Except for the dips in the '08 recession, employment grew in every category until 2020.
The employment rates are very low.
words.defineEn: the fact or state of having a regular paid job
words.defineVi: thực tế hoặc tình trạng có một công việc được trả lương thường xuyên

examples: Let's see what I have in my bag of tricks to entertain the baby.
I aim to strike a happy medium between playing entertaining football and getting results.
Are you not entertained?!
People go to casinos to be entertained.
I like to entertain at home.
words.defineEn: to amuse someone so that they have an enjoyable time
words.defineVi: để giải trí một ai đó để họ có một thời gian thú vị

examples: The newspaper has an entertainment section with movie reviews and celebrity news.
Let's have a movie night upstairs in the entertainment room.
Many tourists visit Europe to experience its vibrant nightlife and entertainment.
I always try to fill my free time with meaningful pursuits instead of wasting hours in front of mindless entertainment, remembering the wise words that idle hands are the devil's playthings.
The actress, known for her carrot top, rose to fame in the entertainment industry and left a lasting impression on audiences.
words.defineEn: movies, television shows, etc. or an activity that is made for people to enjoy
words.defineVi: phim, chương trình truyền hình, v.v. hoặc một hoạt động được tạo ra để mọi người thưởng thức

examples: She picked up the globe artichoke from the market, excited to try a new recipe.
We gathered elderberries, excited to use the aggregate fruits for making jams and pies.
It doesn't particularly excite her.
When hiking in areas with wildlife, it's important to remain quiet and avoid making sudden movements, as the bleating of the kid can excite the tiger
The ghost kitchen world excites me.
words.defineEn: to make a person feel eager, interested, or happy, particularly about something that will happen soon
words.defineVi: để làm cho một người cảm thấy háo hức, quan tâm, hoặc hạnh phúc, đặc biệt là về một cái gì đó sẽ xảy ra sớm

examples: The drug produces a feeling of excitement.
The child jumped up and down with excitement.
The crowd erupted into cries of excitement when their favorite band took the stage.
He learned to check his excitement.
Excitement was coursing through her blood ever more fiercely as she got closer to seeing her sister.
words.defineEn: a feeling of much enthusiasm and happiness
words.defineVi: một cảm giác rất nhiệt tình và hạnh phúc
